title.rendered: “IDF Ramps Up Operations: Inside the Intense Battles Against Terror Targets in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF continues to fight in the Gaza Strip; Brigade 98 expanded its activity in Jebaliya overnight.

Brigade 162 forces continue to fight in the east and at the Rafah crossing on the Gazan side against terror targets in the area.
At the Rafah crossing on the Gazan side, soldiers from the 401 brigade combat team eliminated several squads of armed terrorists in face-to-face battles.
In eastern Rafah, soldiers of the Givati brigade combat team eliminated several terrorists in clashes and located weapons. Aircraft of the Air Force attacked in the direction of the forces a squad of terrorists who emerged from a launch area. In addition, a position from which additional terrorists operated who fired at the soldiers was attacked.

The parachute battalion combat teams, 460, and 7 under the command of Brigade 98 expanded their fight in Jebaliya overnight and spread to additional terror targets in the area.
In the last day, the forces conducted many battles, eliminated dozens of terrorists firing at them with tank fire and destroyed a bomb cache hidden in the area. An aircraft attacked and eliminated a terrorist identified carrying an RPG close to the forces who was on his way to fire at them.

In the Zeitoun area, Brigade 99 soldiers continued their attack against terror targets in the area over the last day.
Soldiers from the combat team of the 2nd Brigade located tunnel entrances during the operation and destroyed several launchers.
Soldiers from the combat team of the Nahal Brigade eliminated several terrorists and destroyed a weapons cache and additional terror infrastructures.

Fighter jets of the Air Force led by Brigade 99 attacked last night (Tuesday) a command and control center of terror organizations in the center of the strip and eliminated five terrorists who were there.
Also, artillery soldiers of battalion 679 eliminated several terrorists moving towards the forces operating in the area with tank fire.

During the last day, fighter jets and aircraft of the Air Force attacked over 100 terror targets throughout the Gaza Strip, including armed terrorists, booby-trapped buildings, and additional terror infrastructures.

Attached is footage of the IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: :https://bit.ly/3wD65f9

Attached is footage of the forces’ activity in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4bzsokM

Attached are photos from the forces’ activity in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC14052024639786976097462
